TCName.consignmentArticles: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR,b.lifnr FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM D, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_EAN E, SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_SOH F,zwowc_art_list_procure g WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR AND C.MATNR = D.MATNR AND D.MATNR = E.MATNR AND E.MATNR = F.ARTICLE and b.matnr=g.matnr and b.lifnr=g.lifnr and b.source_of_supply='1' and a.mtart='HAWA' and b.lifnr='vendorNumber' and b.perpetual_flag='Y' and b.alc_status<>'ES' and g.prime_vendor_flg='Y'
TCName.nonConsignmentArticles: SELECT DISTINCT A.MATNR,b.lifnr FROM SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER A, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_LISTING B, SAAP.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT C, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_UOM D, SAAP.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_EAN E, SAAP.LOCAL_WOW_SOH F,zwowc_art_list_procure g WHERE A.MATNR = B.MATNR AND B.MATNR = C.MATNR AND C.MATNR = D.MATNR AND D.MATNR = E.MATNR AND E.MATNR = F.ARTICLE and b.matnr=g.matnr and b.lifnr=g.lifnr and b.source_of_supply='A' and a.mtart='HAWA' and b.lifnr='vendorNumber' and b.perpetual_flag='Y' and b.alc_status<>'ES' and g.prime_vendor_flg='Y'
TCName.claim: select werks,matnr,claim_no,created_user from LOCAL_WOW_FINALIZED_RTV where claim_no='claimNumber'
TCName.soh: select store_soh from local_wow_soh where article='articleNumber'

TCName.name: articleLimitSmkt
TCName.vendorNumber: select lifnr from zwowc_art_list_procure where prime_vendor_flg='Y' and lifnr in (select distinct d.lifnr from zwowc_article_listing a,zwowc_article_master b,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF c,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_PROCURE d,zwowc_vendor_master e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=a.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.lifnr=e.lifnr and d.prime_vendor_flg='Y' and e.international_vendor<>'ZI' and a.perpetual_flag='Y' and a.alc_status<>'ES' and b.mtart='HAWA' and b.plu_code='') group by lifnr having count(matnr) >'150'

TCName.name: articleLimitBigW
TCName.vendorNumber: select lifnr from zwowc_art_list_procure where prime_vendor_flg='Y' and lifnr in (select distinct d.lifnr from zwowc_article_listing a,zwowc_article_master b,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF c,ZWOWC_ART_LIST_PROCURE d,zwowc_vendor_master e where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=a.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.lifnr=e.lifnr and d.prime_vendor_flg='Y' and e.international_vendor<>'ZI' and a.perpetual_flag='Y' and a.alc_status<>'ES' and b.mtart='HAWA' and b.plu_code='') group by lifnr having count(matnr) >'180'
TCName.vendorArticles: select distinct matnr from zwowc_art_list_procure where prime_vendor_flg='Y' and matnr in (select a.matnr from zwowc_article_listing a,zwowc_article_master b,saap.zwowc_ARTICLE_HIER_XREF c where a.matnr=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=a.matnr and a.perpetual_flag='Y' and a.alc_status<>'ES' and b.mtart='HAWA' and b.DANGEROUS_GOODS_IND<>'Y'and b.plu_code='') and lifnr ='vendorNumber' and matnr in (select distinct matnr from mat_view_order_uom)
